value:
This mission is nothing like any I've
been assigned before... Even so, I will
do my best—in Ilia's name!

Pegasus Knights such as myself were
raised among the mountains of Ilia...
the exact opposite of a sunny beach.

Clothes like these might be more
fitting for Farina—or even Florina...

The sound of the waves is so nice...
It leaves me feeling relaxed, even
after an exhausting battle.

The sea looks wonderful from above,
you know... Would you like me to
show you, $Nu?

I come bearing summertime greetings
from $Nf.
I hope to keep riding this wave!
Seems I've grown used to this heat...

Coming from a country of snow...
this heat can make life difficult.
Oh! A summertime gift? Thank you.

I am Fiora, Pegasus Knight of Ilia.
If my subordinates saw me like this...
they wouldn't know what to think.

My sisters and I were raised in Ilia, a
country blanketed in snow. We never
knew the rays of the summer sun...$k$pSpending time on the beach has
introduced me to a whole new world,
exposing me to a new way of life.$k$pAs a mercenary, I feel I must learn
more about what awaits me out
in the wider world.$k$pBeing here has helped me understand
how bright and vivid the world can
be—along with the virtues of peace...$k$pI suppose what I mean to say is...
Thank you for putting me on this
mission, $Nu!
えいっ！
それっ！
きゃああっ！
No swimsuit can stop me!
Glory to Ilia!
In Ilia's name!
I'm not used to this!
Florina... Farina...
Umm...
This IS for the mission, right?
Yaah! Th-this is no time to test my reflexes!
Ilia is a snow-covered country, so I usually dress to stay warm...
I encourage you to judge me based solely on my ability.
Sometimes I wonder whether everyone building sandcastles here has their priorities aligned...
Not just anyone can command a company of mercenaries in something like this.
I've never had occasion to swim before... Any advice?
Can do.
I must focus...
A mission?
